title: RACING SESSION detail page Â» IMAGES
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see an image gallery for each RACING SESSION\
So I can see photos of the winner or the podium
description:
* The RACING SESSION detail page contains a section with a list of all connected IMAGES.
* Each IMAGE in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each IMAGE in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each IMAGE in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no IMAGE connected to the RACING SESSION then the section is not displayed at all.
